summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3864 for the improvement of 32nd Avenue West and 31st Avenue West, each from Elmore Street to Emerson Street, and certain parts of certain streets and avenues, by constructing watermains with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 47290, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
